about_the_game:
Note: there are currently not many active users for this game. I hope for this to change soon as the community grows. For now, feel free to message me for a free extra copy to play with friends!

From the creator of hit mobile game "Spy.io" comes "Murder&Spies", a unique take on the multiplayer murder mystery genre. In this online social deduction game, every player is a spy with a single objective: eliminate your assigned target while staying hidden from the spy hunting you. The catch? You can only identify your target by the hat they wear, and you have no idea who’s after you. It’s a tense game of cat-and-mouse where one wrong move could be your last.

Each time you successfully eliminate your target, your tablet updates with a new one, keeping the action unpredictable and the stakes high. "Murder&Spies" combines strategic gameplay with the fast-paced dynamics of shooter games, creating an experience where every decision counts. Whether you’re tracking down your target or dodging the spy after you, the tension never lets up.

Currently, "Murder&Spies" features one two maps, but more content is in development. The game is still growing, with new maps, modes, and features planned for future updates. Fans of "Spy.io" and other online multiplayer shooters will find a lot to enjoy here, with plenty of room for strategy, stealth, and quick thinking.

Jump into "Murder&Spies" and see if you have what it takes to survive in this high-stakes online murder mystery game. Remember, in a world full of spies, trust no one.
